scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "postcss docs/thin.pcss -o docs/assets/css/thin.css --watch" "postcss docs/thick.pcss -o docs/assets/css/thick.css --watch" "live-server ./docs"
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production concurrently "postcss style/icon.thin.pcss -o dist/icon.thin.css" "postcss style/icon.thick.pcss -o dist/icon.thick.css"
